TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkflowRuntimeService extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示从中派生工作流运行时引擎核心服务的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the workflow runtime engine core services are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 从 类派生的服务可以由工作流运行时引擎启动和停止。Services that derive from the class can be started and stopped by the workflow runtime engine. 但是，启动或停止服务的顺序是不确定的，并且服务可能需要其他服务的支持才能在启动时正确初始化自身，反过来，也可能需要其他服务的支持才能在停止时正确地关闭。The order in which the services are started or stopped, however, is indeterminate, and services may require the support of other services in order to properly initialize themselves when they are started, and, conversely, may require the to support of other services in order to properly shut down when they are stopped. 为了解决此问题，工作流运行时引擎为启动和停止服务提供了两阶段机制。To address this problem, the workflow runtime engine provides two-phase mechanisms for starting and stopping services. 在调用 时，工作流运行时引擎为其每个派生自 类的服务调用 方法。When is called, the workflow runtime engine invokes the method for each of its services that derive from the class. 在启动所有这些服务之后，工作流运行时引擎将引发 事件，这会导致为每个工作流运行时引擎服务调用 方法。After all of these services have been started, the workflow runtime engine raises the event, which causes the method to be invoked for each workflow runtime engine service. 您的服务可以重写 方法，从而参与此两阶段过程。Your service can override the method to participate in this two phase process. 同样，在调用 时， 方法、 事件和 方法提供此两阶段机制。Similarly, when is called, the method, the event, and the method provide this two-phase mechanism. State 属性包含一个 值，该值指示服务是处于启动和停止过程中，还是已完全启动或停止。The State property contains a value that indicates whether the service is in the process of starting or stopping or is completely started or stopped. 派生自 类的服务在遇到导致无法处理的异常的情形时，可以通过调用 来引发 事件。Services that derive from the class can raise the event when they encounter a condition that causes an unhandled exception by calling . 派生自 类、 类、 类和 类的服务最终都是从 类派生的。Services derived from the class, the class, the class, and the class ultimately derives from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化为 。 is initialized to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStarted() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，表示将在工作流运行时引擎引发 事件时调用的方法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现两阶段启动机制，这样，当工作流运行时引擎为其所有工作流运行时引擎服务调用 方法之后，工作流运行时引擎服务可以执行任何依赖于其他服务的初始化。The class implements a two-phase starting mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may perform any initialization that depends on other services after the workflow runtime engine has invoked the method for all of its workflow runtime engine services. 在工作流运行时引擎调用其所有工作流运行时引擎服务的 方法后，将引发 事件。After the workflow runtime engine has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the event. 可以重写 方法，在引发 事件时提供服务所需的任何最终启动功能。You can override the method to provide any final startup functionality required by your service when the event is raised. 事件的订阅和取消订阅机制在内部进行处理。The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the event is handled internally. > [!NOTE] > 如果在启动工作流运行时引擎之后，通过调用 将您的服务添加到工作流运行时引擎，则工作流运行时引擎将在该服务上调用 。If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 不过，由于在这种情况下已经发生 事件，因此，您的服务可能需要在 方法内部执行任何通常在 中执行的初始化。However, in this situation, the event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 可以测试 ，确定工作流运行时引擎是否已启动。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started. 在调用 之前， 设置为 。 is set to before is invoked. 的默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation of performs no action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStopped() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，表示将在工作流运行时引擎引发 事件时调用的方法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现两阶段停止机制，这样，当工作流运行时引擎调用服务的 方法之后，工作流运行时引擎服务仍可以保留部分功能，以便支持其他服务的关闭操作（如有必要）。The class implements a two-phase stopping mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may retain some functionality after their method is invoked by the workflow runtime engine in order that they may, if necessary, support the shutdown of other services. 在工作流运行时引擎调用其所有工作流运行时引擎服务的 方法后，将引发 事件。After the workflow runtime engine has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the event. 可以重写 方法，在引发 事件时提供服务所需的任何最终关闭功能。You can override the method to provide any final shutdown functionality required by your service when the event is raised. 事件的订阅和取消订阅机制在内部进行处理。The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the event is handled internally. > [!NOTE] > 当工作流运行时引擎正在运行时，如果通过调用 从工作流运行时引擎中移除了 ，则工作流运行时引擎将在服务上调用 。If your is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 不过，在这种情况下，不会为服务调用 方法。However, in this situation, the method will not be called for your service. 因此，您的服务可能需要在 方法内部执行任何通常在 中执行的最终关闭。Therefore, your service may have to perform any final shutdown that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 可以测试 ，确定工作流运行时引擎是否正在运行。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running. 在调用 之前， 设置为 。 is set to before is invoked. 的默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation of performs no action.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent (Exception exception, Guid instanceId);
.method familyhidebysig instance void RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent(class System.Exception exception, valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed

span.span: The exception that could not be handled.

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 与未经处理的异常关联的工作流实例的 。

span.span: The of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当服务在其执行期间遇到无法处理的异常时，可以调用 来引发 事件。Your service can call to raise the event when it encounters an exception that it cannot handle during its execution. 应传递与未处理异常关联的工作流实例的 。You should pass the of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception. 例如，计时器服务可能会传递与发生异常的计时器关联的 。For example, a timer service might pass the associated with the timer for which the exception occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Runtime As WorkflowRuntime

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务上调用 之前，工作流运行时引擎将设置此属性。The workflow runtime engine sets this property before it calls on the service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，启动服务并将 更改为 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, starts the service and changes the to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 时，工作流运行时引擎在其所有派生自 类的服务上调用 。 is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the class when is called. 在工作流运行时引擎启动之后，通过调用 将某个工作流运行时引擎服务添加到工作流运行时引擎时，工作流运行时引擎也会调用 。 is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to after the workflow runtime engine has already started. 的默认实现跟踪服务是否已启动；如果在服务已运行的情况下启动该服务，则使用此信息引发适当的异常。The default implementation of tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is started while it is already running. 通过重写此方法，可以提供由工作流运行时引擎启动服务时所需的附加功能。You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service started by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method. 当工作流运行时引擎在服务上调用 时，不能确保哪些服务正在运行（如果有）。There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be running when the workflow runtime engine calls on your service. 因此，在 方法中，只应执行任何不依赖于由其他服务提供的功能的初始化。Therefore, in the method, you should only perform any initialization that does not depend on functionality provided by other services. 这包括由核心服务（如计划程序服务）提供的功能。This includes functionality provided by core services such as the scheduler service. 在工作流运行时引擎调用其所有工作流运行时引擎服务的 方法后，将引发 事件。The workflow runtime engine raises the event after it has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services. 如果在启动所有工作流运行时引擎服务之后，服务需要其他初始化，则可以重写 方法，在引发 事件时执行此初始化。If your service requires additional initialization after all of the workflow runtime engine services have been started, you can override the method in order to perform this initialization when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果在启动工作流运行时引擎之后，通过调用 将您的服务添加到工作流运行时引擎，则工作流运行时引擎将在该服务上调用 。If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 不过，由于在这种情况下已经发生 事件，因此，您的服务可能需要在 方法内部执行任何通常在 中执行的初始化。However, in this situation, the event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 可以测试 ，确定工作流运行时引擎是否已启动。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started. 只应由工作流运行时引擎调用。 should only be called by the workflow runtime engine. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在从 派生的对象 TerminationTrackingService 上调用 Start 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the Start method on an object derived from , TerminationTrackingService. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[终止跟踪服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#112)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#112)]

exception.span: 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）

span.span: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
The service has already been started.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property State As WorkflowRuntimeServiceState

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为启动和停止工作流运行时引擎服务实现两阶段机制。The class implements two-phase mechanisms for both starting and stopping a workflow runtime engine service. 启动机制的第一阶段在工作流运行时引擎调用服务的 方法的实现时开始。The first phase of the start mechanism begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the method for the service. 此方法应调用 的基实现，该实现将 设置为 。This method should call the base implementation of , which sets to . 当工作流运行时引擎启动了其所有工作流运行时引擎服务之后，在引发 事件时，发生第二阶段。The second phase occurs after the workflow runtime engine starts all of its workflow runtime engine services when it raises the event. 在内部管理对此事件的订阅，并且其处理程序会将 设置为 。The internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set to . 当工作流运行时引擎调用服务的 方法的实现时，用于停止工作流运行时引擎服务的两阶段机制开始。The two-phase mechanism for stopping a workflow runtime engine service begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the method for the service. 此方法应调用 的基实现，该实现将 设置为 。This method should call the base implementation of , which sets to . 在工作流运行时引擎停止其所有工作流运行时引擎服务后，将引发 事件。After it has stopped all of its workflow runtime engine services, the workflow runtime engine raises the event. 在内部管理对此事件的订阅，并且其处理程序会将 设置为 。The internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，停止服务并将 更改为 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, stops the service and changes the to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 时，工作流运行时引擎在其所有派生自 类的服务上调用 。 is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the class when is called. 在通过调用 从工作流运行时引擎中移除工作流运行时引擎服务时，工作流运行时引擎也会调用 。 is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to . 的默认实现跟踪服务是否已启动，如果在尚未启动服务的情况下停止该服务，则使用此信息引发适当的异常。The default implementation of tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is stopped before it is started. 通过重写此方法，可以提供由工作流运行时引擎停止服务时所需的附加功能。You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service stopped by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method. 在服务上调用 时，不能确保将要停止或正在运行哪些服务（如果有）。There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be stopped or running when is called on your service. 在工作流运行时引擎调用其所有工作流运行时引擎服务的 方法后，将引发 事件。The workflow runtime engine raises the event after it has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services. 您的服务可能需要保留部分剩余功能以便支持其他服务，直到由工作流运行时引擎对所有工作流运行时引擎服务调用了各自的 Stop 方法。Your service may need to retain some residual functionality to support other services until all the workflow runtime engine services have had their stop methods invoked by the workflow runtime engine. 如果您的服务必须保留此类功能，则可以重写 方法，在引发 事件时执行完成停止服务所需的任何附加操作。If your service must retain such functionality, you can override the method to perform any additional action required to finish stopping your service when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当工作流运行时引擎正在运行时，如果通过调用 从工作流运行时引擎中移除了 ，则工作流运行时引擎将在服务上调用 。If your is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 不过，在这种情况下，不会为服务调用 方法。However, in this situation, the method will not be called for your service. 因此，您的服务可能需要在 方法内部执行任何通常在 中执行的附加关闭功能。Therefore, your service may have to perform any additional shutdown functionality that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 可以测试 ，确定工作流运行时引擎是否正在运行。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running. 只应由工作流运行时引擎调用。 should only be called by the workflow runtime engine.

span.span: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
The service has not yet been started.
